attributes.description:
Full-service history on this low mileage Polo TSI
Demo model that means you as client will be the first registered owner
Balance of the 3year/45000km Service plan still active and you have the option to extend or upgrade to a maintenance plan
This Polo TSI passes through an 80-point mechanical check before delivery
Delivery nationwide with no extra costs
Finance available through all major finance houses
Factory fitted extras: park distance control front&rear, cruise control, digital display, APP-connect, auto lights and much more

attributes.description:
1st Installment  November 2022
Here are some of what the team at Renault Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees
attributes.finance_estimate:

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
